answers.answer: That's a great suggestion. We've heard requests for a diabetes tracker from a few members now. We'll add this to our list and let you know when it's available.

Hi,We just released a new Diabetes tracker today. You can get it in the Diabetes community at:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/show/46. We're going to be adding to this over the next few weeks, so please let us know your feedback. Thanks!MedHelp

question: Tracking sugar readings daily is a pain.  A tracker for this would be great!
title: Idea for Tracker - Diabetes
